heading: HR01098
0: RESOLUTION COMMEMORATING THE HEROISM AND RECOGNIZING THE LEGACY LEFT BY 1ST LIEUTENANT JOHN FREDERICK SAVELLANO OF THE MARINES TOGETHER WITH HIS TEAM AND DEVISING A COURSE OF ACTION TO PLACE THEM AND THOSE THAT ARE SIMILARLY SITUATED IN THE ANNALS OF PHILIPPINE HISTORY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-07-25
history:

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION COMMEMORATING THE HEROISM AND RECOGNIZING THE LEGACY LEFT BY 1ST LIEUTENANT JOHN FREDERICK SAVELLANO OF THE MARINES TOGETHER WITH HIS TEAM AND DEVISING A COURSE OF ACTION TO PLACE THEM AND THOSE THAT ARE SIMILARLY SITUATED IN THE ANNALS OF PHILIPPINE HISTORY
